data.enText: principles concerning right and wrong or good and bad behaviour

data.chText: 公众 / 个人道德问题

data.enText: Standards of morality seem to be dropping.
the degree to which sth is right or wrong, good or bad, etc. according to moral principles

data.chText: 有关堕胎是否道德的辩论
data.enText: a debate on the morality of abortion
a system of moral principles followed by a particular group of people

tr: concern with the distinction between good and evil or right and wrong
motivation based on ideas of right and wrong

value.def: Morality is the belief that some behaviour is right and acceptable and that other behaviour is wrong.

example.ex: ...standards of morality and justice in society.
example.tran: 社会道德和正义的标准

value.def: A morality is a system of principles and values concerning people's behaviour, which is generally accepted by a society or by a particular group of people.

example.tran: 存在性别歧视的道德规范
社区和其共同的道义准则

value.tran: 道义准则;道德规范;伦理学

value.def: The morality of something is how right or acceptable it is.

example.ex: ...the arguments about the morality of blood sports.
example.tran: 有关猎杀动物行为是否道德的争论

trans: 道德剧，寓意剧(流行于15和16世纪，剧中人物代表善与恶)
